title: Growing Up Psychic: My Story of Not Just Surviving But Thriving
description:
Growing Up Psychic: My Story of Not Just Surviving But Thriving - And How Others Like Me Can, Too

NO one knows more about psychic kids than Chip Coffey, and no expert on psychic kids is better known throughout the world. These kids are widely misunderstood, misjudged, and misdiagnosed.
